meanings.definition: A person who is socially inept or awkward.
meanings.sent1: The dweebs in the class often sat alone during lunch.
meanings.sent2: The group of dweebs struggled to make conversation at the party.
meanings.sent3: The dweebs tried to join the dance but ended up stepping on each other's toes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cool cats, the dweebs were like penguins trying to fly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dweebs nervously fidgeting in the corner stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are considered nerdy or uncool.
meanings.sent1: During the movie night, the dweebs debated the best sci-fi series.
meanings.sent2: The dweebs gathered around the comic book store every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: The dweebs proudly wore their mismatched socks as a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of trends, the dweebs were like colorful fish swimming against the current.
meanings.sent5: The dweebs' enthusiasm for coding competitions was contagious among their peers.
